description:
Under the leadership of http://anidb.net/ch139528 [Sacred Queen Calca], the Roebel Sacred Kingdom enjoyed an era of peace, protected behind their great walls. However, that peace was easily destroyed by the sudden appearance of the http://anidb.net/ch72782 [Demon Emperor Jaldabaoth] and the attack of the Demi-Human Alliance. Though the grandmaster of Roebel Sacred Kingdom’s Sacred Paladin Order, http://anidb.net/ch139531 [Remedios], and the high priestess, http://anidb.net/ch139529 [Kelart], gathered their forces to retaliate, they could not overcome the overwhelming difference in Jaldabaoth`s power, and their kingdom is now on the verge of collapse. Remedios travels with her order and her subordinate, http://anidb.net/ch139530 [Neia], to a certain kingdom in hopes of gaining power to counter Jaldabaoth. The name of that kingdom is Sorcerer Kingdom http://anidb.net/ch72785 [Ainz Ooal Gown]. It is a grotesque nation ruled by an undead and despised by those of the Sacred Kingdom—
Source: Kadokawa

WIKIPEDIA_JP: オーバーロード_(アニメ)

titles.title: 劇場版 OVERLORD 聖王国編
